mapper.sql: a.id, a.office_id AS officeId, a.name, a.enname, a.name AS oldName, a.enname AS oldEnname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.user_type AS userType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, d.label AS "dataScopeName", a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, o.name AS officeName, o.code, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData

SELECT , rm.menu_id AS "menuList.id", ro.office_id AS "officeList.id"
FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_office ro ON ro.role_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d ON d.value = a.data_scope WHERE a.id = #{id} AND d.type = 'sys_data_scope'

SELECT
FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d ON d.value = a.data_scope WHERE a.name = #{name} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND d.type = 'sys_data_scope'

SELECT
FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d ON d.value = a.data_scope WHERE a.enname = #{enname} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND d.type = 'sys_data_scope'

SELECT
FROM sys_role a LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d ON d.value = a.data_scope WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND d.type = 'sys_data_scope' ORDER BY o.code, a.name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( id, office_id, name, enname, role_type, user_type, data_scope, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, is_sys, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{officeId}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{roleType}, #{userType}, #{dataScope}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysData}, #{useable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET office_id = #{officeId}, name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, role_type = #{roleType}, user_type = #{userType}, data_scope = #{dataScope}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, is_sys = #{sysData}, useable = #{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
